extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    BCHM218 or MBIO218 or BIOL330.

basic.description:
Intensive laboratory work (8h/day) to be carried out over two and a half weeks in May. Practical work includes DNA isolations, DNA cloning, PCR, production of proteins, biochemical and immunological analysis of proteins.
NOTE    Lab Expenses: estimated cost $250. Priority to students registered in BIOL  Major and Specialization degree plans. See course website for details.
basic.subject: BIOL
basic.title: Techniques in Molecular Biology
